LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_Frame_Plasteel.label: plasteel frame
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_Frame_Plasteel.descr: A frame infused with hyper-tempered and refined plasteel.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_Frame_Refined.label: refined frame
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_Frame_Refined.descri: A frame exquisitely and precisely etched, carved, and designed to look as refined and eminently noble as possible. The frame may not enhance any explicit purpose, but it certainly affects perception of its bearer.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_Frame_Sanitary.label: sanitary frame
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_Frame_Sanitary.descr: A frame ruthlessly treated and sanitized to ensure zero habitability to any form of detritus. This frame completely rejects stains, filth, and pathogens. The frame is also optimized for completely smooth movement, suiting it well in surgeries and treatments.
